huber_loss[source]

huber_loss(x:ComplexFloat, y:ComplexFloat, delta:float=0.5)->float

huber loss

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

The huber loss is like the mean squared error close to zero and mean absolute error for outliers
